This directory contains libraries needed to run ant.

JUnit version 3.8.1
===================

http://www.junit.org/

Use `junit.jar`.

Xalan-Java version 2.7.0
========================

http://xml.apache.org/xalan-j/

Use `xalan.jar` and `serializer.jar`.

XML-Commons Resolver version 1.1
================================

http://xml.apache.org/commons/

Use `resolver.jar`.
